message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.GT, cs.SI 

This paper deals with learning agents that cooperate to solve a common problem, which falls under the category of multi-agent systems (cs.MA) and game theory (cs.GT). The problem being studied is a nonstochastic bandit problem, which is a type of reinforcement learning, placing the paper in the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of a communication network to exchange information also suggests the category of social and information networks (cs.SI).
